column4: how can I let my network manager see a wireless hidden SSID network?
how to let ubuntu network manager see an hidden wireless network?
I think if it's hidden then it's hidden.... my friend has a hidden network.... because he can't get WPA to work
if it's hidden but you know the name then you can access it through the manual config... like magnetron said... but if you want to look for hidden networks... i don't know that you can
